item.description:
Sheet-mulch Party!

 In a permaculture system, fall is an excellent time to build your no-dig garden beds for next year's planting! Come learn this technique which could revolutionize the way you garden...

  • Build garden beds any size or shape using materials from your home or neighborhood.
  • Control weeds and build more fertile soil.
  • Stop digging & tilling or create gardens where digging & tilling are not possible.
  • Turn lawn or weedy areas into productive gardens.

 

 Price of Admission... bring an incredient for the sheet mulch

 * leaves,clean grass clippings, coffee grounds, seaweed, stone dust, newspaper, cardboard, leaves,straw, or mulch hay.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Sheetmulching Work party
